9.ara-name: كتاب الحج عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Yazid bin Al-Asamm narrated about Maimunah:"The Messenger of Allah married he while he was Halal and he stayed with her while he was Halal. She died in Sarif, and we buried her at the (site of the) tent where he had stayed wit her

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الرُّخْصَةِ فِي ذَلِكَ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Permission For That
